Package org.bremersee.security.authentication

Class ReactiveJwtSupportAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bremersee.security.authentication.ReactiveJwtSupportAutoConfiguration
  • @ConditionalOnWebApplication(type=REACTIVE)
@ConditionalOnClass({org.bremersee.security.authentication.JsonPathReactiveJwtConverter.class,org.bremersee.security.authentication.WebClientAccessTokenRetriever.class})
@Configuration
@EnableConfigurationProperties({AuthProperties.class,MessageSourceProperties.class})
public class ReactiveJwtSupportAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    The reactive authentication support auto configuration.
    Author:
    Christian Bremer

      • passwordFlowReactiveAuthenticationManager

@ConditionalOnMissingBean
@Bean
